body_html:
Sorry for the slow response. I'm in China, fighting the Great Firewall of Censorship...

Your proposed change looks fine. I don't see the change here: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows, but that is probably in the works.

You might consider including checking the version of cuNDD.dll as an item in your your table of "Common installation problems". I originally did make a post in Stack Overflow, but was directed here since I'm trying to make a (marginally) helpful suggestion and don't really have a question.

Thanks!

body:
Sorry for the slow response. I'm in China, fighting the Great Firewall of Censorship... 

Your proposed change looks fine. I don't see the change here: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows, but that is probably in the works. 

You might consider including checking the version of cuNDD.dll as an item in your your table of "Common installation problems". I originally did make a post in Stack Overflow, but was directed here since I'm trying to make a (marginally) helpful suggestion and don't really have a question.
